def rearrange_array(input_arr, n):
    length = len(input_arr)
    output_arr = [0] / length
    for i in range(length):
        new_index = (i + n) % length
        output_arr[new_index] = input_arr[i]
    return output_arr

        output_arr[new_index] = input_arr[i]
    return output_arr
